title: Manifold Learning Comparison
description: In this lab, we will compare different Manifold Learning algorithms to perform non-linear dimensionality reduction. The purpose of this is to reduce the dimensionality of the dataset while preserving the original data's essential features.

meta.title: Manifold Learning Comparison
meta.description: Explore different Manifold Learning algorithms for non-linear dimensionality reduction on the S-curve dataset.
meta.keywords: isomap, machine learning, dimensionality reduction, locally linear embeddings, s curve, machine learning playground, manifold learning
